title: Spygal: Thrills, Frills & Espionage! (2012) #1
description: Introducing the globetrotting espionage escapades of SpyGal!  When the evil agents of YUCK scheme to sabotage the world’s most powerful women, who can stand against them? None other than the empowering agents of WOW, and their #1 operative, SpyGal! From the stunning streets of San Francisco to the glamorous parties of Paris, SpyGal fights injustice (and bad skin days) with her unbeatable mix of hi-tech gadgets and wicked quips…but will she ever find true love?
